#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
int noofdigits(int);
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int k,n,c,beg,temp,m,l,sum,a;
    scanf("%d",&k);
    while(k--)
    {
        temp = 0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        c = noofdigits(n);
        beg = n - (9*c);
        while(beg<=n)
        {
            l = beg;
            sum = beg;
            while(l>0)
            {
                a = l%10;
                sum = sum + a;
                l = l /10;
            }
            if(sum==n)
            {
                temp = 1;
                break;
            }
            beg++;
        }
        if(temp==0)
            printf("NONE\n");
        else
            printf("%d\n",beg);
    }
    return 0;
}
int noofdigits(int x)
{
    int count = 0;
    if(x==0)
        count = 1;
    while(x>0)
    {
        x = x/10;
        count++;
    }
    return count;
}
